author: travelandtourworld.com
title: AirMedia to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Unaudited Financial Results on August 25, 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
AirMedia to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Unaudited Financial Results on August 25, 2015 Published on : Friday, August 21, 2015
AirMedia Group Inc. a leading operator of out-of-home advertising platforms in China targeting mid-to-high-end consumers, as well as a first-mover in the in-flight and on-train Wi-Fi market, today announced that it will report its unaudited financial results for the second quarter 2015 ended June 30, 2015 after the U.S. market closes on Tuesday, August 25, 2015 . The Company will hold an earnings conference call on the same day at 8:00 p.m. U.S. Eastern Time ( 5:00 PM U.S. Pacific Time on August 25, 2015 ; 8:00 AM Beijing/ Hong Kong time on August 26, 2015 ).
Conference Call Dial-in Information
U.S.:
+1 866 519 4004
Hong Kong:
+852 800 906 601
International:
+65 6713 5090
China:
+86 400 620 8038
Pass code:
AMCN
A replay of the call will be available for 1 week between 11:00 p.m. on August 25, 2015 and 11:59 p.m. on September 1, 2015, Eastern Time .
Replay Dial-in Information
U.S.:
+1 646 254 3697
International:
+61 2 8199 0299
Conference ID:
97744181
